quotes.quote: He said that black sheeps express everyone else's anger and pain. It's not that they have all the anger and pain-they're just the only ones who let it out. Then the other people don't have to.
A family without a black sheep is not a typical family.
A black sheep is a biting beast.
I was the black sheep of the family, and my mother never really understood me.
Every family needs a black sheep to call them on their bullsh—.
If I was a sheep, I'd be black.
The black sheep are the ones you want to get to know.
I'm a little bit more unusual so I consider myself as the black sheep.
To rally every black sheep is my goal.
Being a black sheep is a way I would describe myself.
The pattern of the prodigal is: rebellion, ruin, repentance, reconciliation, restoration.
To reclaim the prodigal is well, but to save him from ever being a prodigal is better.
I am the prodigal son every time I search for unconditional love where it cannot be found.
The Prodigal Son didn't repent of his sin because he got tired of living like and with the pigs. He repented because God gave him eyes to see.
